Name: Young Cuban
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Fresh dill nestles with rich almond, balanced by a touch of zesty citrus, aromatised by fino sherry with rum playing a fortifying role.
History: UK Bacard√≠ Legacy 2015 winning cocktail created by Ally Martin at Peg + Patriot in London, England.
